document.full_text: lawmakers are weighing $1 trillion in deficit-cutting measures as part of a possible deal that would allow an increase in the country's borrowing authority, vice president joe biden said on tuesday.
document.title: $1 trillion on the table in debt talks
lines_and_colors: lawmakers are weighing $1 trillion in deficit-cutting measures as part of a possible deal that would allow an increase in the country's borrowing authority, vice president joe biden said on tuesday.
